Posted By: Josh Adams
I have the following T206s, all with Sovereign backs:

1.  Jimmy Jackson PSA 3- $55

2.  Charley Carr PSA 4-  $85

3. Bob Rhoades, Right Arm Extended (tougher common) PSA 4- $225

Scans available upon request.  First to say "I'll take it" gets the card.

Thanks for looking.

Josh
